title: Tell us when our hextech keys reset.
body:
Title.  Either a notification or just put the date of reset somewhere in the client.

https://cdn-images-1.medium.com/max/800/1*risUa33rFKyXtSjfu8f0uQ.png

Lack of clarity is a problem.  Even a notification of when you hit the cap would be good.
There isn't a cap, that's the thing. Every key just diminishes your chances of you getting a key. So you could, in theory, end up with .0000000000001% chance to get a key, but you can still get one.

> [{quoted}](name=the Anarchit3cht,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GbIAGJMR,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-06T00:41:39.717+0000)

> There isn't a cap, that's the thing. Every key just diminishes your chances of you getting a key. So you could, in theory, end up with .0000000000001% chance to get a key, but you can still get one.

But then it resets.  Apparently the reset happens around the same time each month, but it's supposedly based off of when you got your first key.  None of that information is available.

More precisely, I think it resets 30 days after you get your first key.

So let's say you get your first key on May 10th, for instance. The reset will be on June 10th. The next key you get after the June reset is on June 14th (because you weren't available on the 10-13th, or because you weren't lucky, or whatever). So the next reset will be on July 14th.

I'm not 100% sure about all that, it has not been confirmed, it's just my educated guess.

it resets about the middle of the month i think. somewhere around the 14th/15th.

It is a thirty day cycle that starts once you play your first match. Say you played your first match after the debut of Hextech Crafting on the first of some month. Your cycle will restart on the thirty-first if you play a match that day. It will restart on the first of the next month if you didn't play a match on the thirty-first.

Because you think your chances reset around the fourteenth or fifteenth, you probably started your cycle then.
